job_history.work_description: Expertly estimating purchasing needs and buying through approved suppliers. Systematically tasted and smelled all prepared dishes, and observed color, texture and garnishes. Effectively managed and assisted kitchen staff in producing food for banquets, catered events and member dining areas.

Established and maintained open, collaborative relationships with the kitchen team. Collaborated closely with the Food and Beverage Director to conduct staff meetings and resolve service, product and personnel issues.
Communicated openly and honestly with the management team during each shift to ensure it ran smoothly.

skills.name: Food Service Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience managing kitchen staff, producing food for events, and ensuring smooth operations, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has held multiple leadership roles, including Dining Services Director and Healthcare Kitchen Manager, demonstrating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Has effectively managed and assisted kitchen staff, established open relationships with team members, and resolved personnel issues, showing expert-level team management skills.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has communicated openly and honestly with management teams and staff, indicating strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Has resolved service, product, and personnel issues, suggesting strong proficiency in problem-solving.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has ensured smooth operations during shifts, indicating strong proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Human Resources Management
skills.explanation: Has a degree in Human Resources Management, but limited direct experience in this field, showing a solid working proficiency.
